document.full_text: fighters loyal to presidential claimant alassane ouattara attacked the residence of incumbent laurent gbagbo in abidjan early on friday and seized control of ivory coast's state television, a ouattara spokesman said.
document.title: ouattara forces say attack gbagbo abidjan residence
lines_and_colors: fighters loyal to presidential claimant alassane ouattara attacked the residence of incumbent laurent gbagbo in abidjan early on friday and seized control of ivory coast's state television, a ouattara spokesman said.
